Package com.uwgb.GBCoin.Model

Class TransactionPool

java.lang.Object
com.uwgb.GBCoin.Model.TransactionPool
public class TransactionPool extends Object
The TransactionPool is responsible for managing transactions It can add transactions to the pool, get total coin amount and spend new transactions

      public double getTotalCoins(PublicKey publicKey)
      method to get a wallet's total number of coins
      Parameters:
      publicKey - the amount of spendable tokens the publickey we want to check
      Returns:
      a double value of all the utxo's for which this wallet can spend

    • spendNewTransaction

      public void spendNewTransaction(double amount, Wallet spender, HashMap<PublicKey,Double> receiverKeys) throws Exception
      Method to spend a new transaction(s)
      Parameters:
      amount - the amount the spender needs to spend
      spender - the full wallet of the spender
      receiverKeys - hashmap with the receiver keys and values
      Throws:
      Exception

    • getUTXOSetToSpend

      public ArrayList<UTXO> getUTXOSetToSpend(double amount, PublicKey publicKey)
      Method to get all of the individual UTXO's for which a certain address can spend
      Parameters:
      amount - the amount we are trying to spend
      publicKey - the address of where the coins need to come from
      Returns:
      return all of the utxo's that satisfy the amount requirement
